channel.title: [Poll] How Often Do You Listen to Your Own Tracks?
channel.description: [poll min=1 max=1 public=true] * Never, they are too bad. * Maybe once or twice. * Sometimes. * All the time. * On loop! [/poll]

item.title: [Poll] How Often Do You Listen to Your Own Tracks?
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
Since I know them so well, I’m able to fall asleep to them since I can expect the rhythm changes.

Read full topic

item.title: [Poll] How Often Do You Listen to Your Own Tracks?

item.title: [Poll] How Often Do You Listen to Your Own Tracks?
item.dc:creator: anon83262203
item.description:
Every day, sometimes on loop. I listened to a song I just released about five times. I was very happy with it.

item.source: [Poll] How Often Do You Listen to Your Own Tracks?

item.title: [Poll] How Often Do You Listen to Your Own Tracks?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
On loop, as I’m always actively and passively listening and thinking about ways to develop and improve each track – and my writing and production in general.

(I intend for anything promising that I create in Auxy to be developed and finished outside of Auxy, so after the Auxy ‘demo’ has been done, there’s still more to be done.)

Read full topic
item.source: [Poll] How Often Do You Listen to Your Own Tracks?
